simulator.elevatormodules

Class DoorOpenedSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulator.payloads.Networkable
      • simulator.elevatormodules.Module
        • simulator.elevatormodules.DoorOpenedSensor

  • public class DoorOpenedSensor
extends Module
    Sends network messages to indicate whether each door is greater than 99% open. If a door is greater than 99% open, the corresponding message value is true, otherwise the message value is false. A separate message is sent for each door.
